thread.title: Joe Picc
thread.title_full: Brake Performance reviewed by Joe Picc

author: Joe Picc
title: Joe Picc
text: Brake Performance is the real deal..Joe is a customer for life..I did a ton of research and purchased high end rotors and pads... the price was more than reasonable and it's made in America... keep our Brothers working and at the same time save yourself some cash... Thanks Break Performance
